Join us at R!sk 2026, our conference dedicated to the open-source R community and risk analytics. 

![](images/risk-main-image.png)

### **Dates:** February 18–19, 2026
### **Location:** 100% online

- **Talks will be recorded**  
- **Speakers participate in live Q&A**  
- **Schedule is US Eastern Time Zone**

## Call for Proposals

Extended One Week! **Deadline: December 14, 2025**

R!sk 2026 welcomes talks about risk in **all** areas where it's an impactful element in your work—from healthcare and climate to cybersecurity, supply chain, and beyond. We're looking for presentations that showcase how R helps you succeed in managing, analyzing, and communicating risk across diverse domains.

If you would like to submit a proposal, please visit the [Call for Proposals](cfp.qmd) page.
